Model.Map

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Model.Map.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Map
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is a class of map implements the observable. This is a class of map implementation. To do the change of the map. Add the element to the map, move the element, remove the element from the map.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addMapElement

        public boolean addMapElement(MapCell pMapElement)
        To add the element in the map. get the row and column where the element want to be added. To see whether the row and column exist and whether the element is start or end. Add the element to the map. set the change and notify the observers.
        Parameters:
        pMapElement - element in the map.
        Returns:
        mapCell ret.

      • removeMapElement

        public boolean removeMapElement(int pRow,
                       int pCol)
        To remove the element from the map. If the row and column exist and there is an element in that cell. Remove the element from that cell. set the change and notify the observers.
        Parameters:
        pRow - the rows in the map
        pCol - the columns in the map
        Returns:
        mapCell ret

      • moveMapElement

        public boolean moveMapElement(int pSrcRow,
                     int pSrcCol,
                     int pDestRow,
                     int pDestCol)
        To move the element. To see whether the destinate row and column in the map and the old cell is not none and destinate cell is none. Then move the element to the destinate row and column. set the change and notify the observers.
        Parameters:
        pSrcRow - the old row in the map
        pSrcCol - the old column in the map
        pDestRow - the destinate row in the map
        pDestCol - the destinate column in the map
        Returns:
        mapCell ret

        To validate the map. To see whether there have a start element and an end element in the map.
        Parameters:
        pMsg -
        Returns:
        mapCell ret with true or false
